4. test budget adjustments and monitor their impact on roi
5. fine-tune budget distribution based on latest performance data
1. design multiple versions of call-to-action placements
2. a/b test different cta positions on the landing page
3. analyze click-through rates for each version
4. select the cta placement with the highest conversion rate
5. implement the optimal cta placement across similar pages

tasks.task_name: optimize landing page design for usability
checklists: 1. conduct user experience audits on current landing pages
2. identify design elements that hinder user interaction
3. redesign landing pages to enhance navigation and readability
4. test redesigned pages with real users or usability testing tools
5. refine designs based on feedback and testing results
1. review landing page content for clarity and relevance to target audiences
2. rewrite content to clearly communicate the value proposition
3. incorporate engaging and persuasive language
4. test content variations to gauge user response
5. adjust content continuously based on user feedback and analytics

tasks.task_name: set up tracking for all conversion points
checklists: 1. identify all potential conversion points within the customer journey
2. implement tracking codes or pixels at each conversion point
3. verify that tracking tools are collecting data accurately
4. configure analytics platforms to report on these conversions
5. ensure data privacy standards are met in tracking setups

tasks.task_name: analyze paths to conversion using analytics
checklists: 1. use analytics tools to visualize paths users take through the site
2. analyze paths to see where users commonly drop off or complete goals
3. use insights from behavior flow to optimize user journeys and content placement
4. make navigational or structural changes to facilitate better user flows
5. continuously monitor behavior flows for new insights and necessary adjustments
1. aggregate conversion data across different channels and campaigns
2. identify trends in conversion rates over time
3. dissect data to uncover insights about user behavior and preferences
4. prepare detailed reports highlighting key conversion metrics
5. present and discuss findings with stakeholders to inform future strategies

tasks.task_name: map out and analyze existing funnels
checklists: 1. diagram all current conversion funnels to visualize the customer journey
2. identify stages in the funnel with high drop-off rates
3. analyze user interactions at each stage to understand barriers
4. solicit user feedback on experiences within the funnel
5. compile findings to guide funnel optimization efforts

tasks.task_name: identify and remove friction points in funnels
checklists: 1. pinpoint areas within the funnel where users experience difficulties
2. assess possible causes of friction and test hypotheses through a/b testing
3. implement changes to simplify and enhance the user experience
4. monitor user reactions and conversion improvements post-implementation
5. document adjustments and their impacts for ongoing refinement

tasks.task_name: test new funnel strategies and iterate
checklists: 1. develop new funnel approaches based on insights from existing data
2. pilot new funnels with a segment of the target audience
3. collect and analyze performance data from tests
4. refine funnel strategies based on test results
5. roll out successful new funnels more broadly and continue iterative improvements
